description:
Cafeteria plan for the University of Hannover/Germany. Swipe left and right to navigate through the days of the week. Choose up to three favorites for daily use.

Changelog:
v1.1.2 - BUGFIX: Handle annotations in menus
v1.1.1 - Bio-Line has been dropped from Hauptmensa
v1.1.0 - Use Google Translations for meals if language code is not DE (thanks to Markus Korn); Pretty Print Ingredients (thanks to Markus Korn)
v1.0.0 - New Cafeterias available; new Preferences Scene to select favorites; new help dialog
v0.9.1 - BUGFIXES: Would not scroll to the current day if using for the first time; Lost all data when launched in flight mode.


Contact & Support: hurling83 (at) googlemail.com
